com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex

Interface MatchProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMatchProcessor, DoNothingProcessor, HandlerAwareTokenProcessor, NoMatchAwareMatchProcessor, ReplacingProcessor, StateMachine, TokenProcessor, Transitions

    public interface MatchProcessor
    This interface is used by RegexModifier. This interface defines what to do if the regular expression matches some text in the stream.
    Since:
    18.06.2011
    Author:
    rwoo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MatchProcessorResult process(StringBuilder characterBuffer, int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer, MatchResult matchResult)
      Processes the given match.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        MatchProcessorResult process(StringBuilder characterBuffer,
                             int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer,
                             MatchResult matchResult)
        Processes the given match. The match processor is allowed to modify the given character buffer but it must not modify the characters before the first modifiable character in the buffer because the characters before that position are considered unmodifiable.
        Parameters:
        characterBuffer - Must not be null.
        firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer - See the parameter with the same name in Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean).
        matchResult - The match that is found in the given character buffer. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        Returns an object that describes where to continue the matching.
